Description:
Position Title:             Sales ExecutiveEmployment Type:     Full TimeSalary:                         up to 10K AED all-inclusive depending on experience and qualifications plus duty mealJob Location:            Abu Dhabi, UAE About the Client:An international French restaurant group in UAE. Job Description:  Generate leads and drive sales for private dining events and special occasions.
Cultivate and maintain relationships with corporate clients and event planners.
Coordinate event logistics and ensure an exceptional guest experience.
Provide in-depth menu and promotion knowledge to clients.
Monitor sales activities and contribute to revenue growth targets.Skills
Skills:
Open to European nationals
At least 2 years of experience in the similar role
Must have a hospitality or stand-alone restaurant (F&B or Events) background.
Excellent client and sales skills
Immediate joiners are preferrable
